Package apollo

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connection.SQLITE_API  
    DataStore.SQLITE_API  
    Mutex.Kernel32Ex  
    ResultSet.SQLITE_API  
    Statement.SQLITE_API  
    Table
    This represents a Table in the database.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    To get a Connection, call getConnection().
    Connection.Handle  
    DataStore
    A data store is a repository of a set of data objects.
    Mutex
    A Mutex controls access to a shared resource across multiple processes.
    OID
    An OID is an object identifier.
    QuickResultSet
    The only difference between this and a regular resultset is that calling close() on this also recycles the Connection.
    ResultSet
    ResultSet
    Schema
    This really should be called SchemaTransaction, but there isn't another class called Schema, so this won't be confusing, and I like the shorter name.
    Statement
    I really dislike this class.
    Statement.Handle  
    Transaction
    A Transaction may have multiple mutexes.
    XBase
    XBase is the abstract base class for Transactions.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SQLiteException
    The sqlite code doesn't throw any exceptions, instead it returns error codes.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Table.Bool
    Used to annotate that a field is a boolean.
    Table.NotNull
    Used to annotate that a field cannot be null.
    Table.PrimaryKey
    Used to annotate that a field is a PrimaryKey.
